name: Ann Arbor
info: My hometown - grew up without a car commuting by bike in this area

name: New Haven
info: Lived in the New Haven area for 5+ years

name: Des Moines, IA
info: Raced at Flatland Junior Elite Cup 2016.

name: West Virginia
info: Crossed into West Virginia twice while biking C&O Canal from Washington to Cumberland in 2021. Visited Paw Paw and Shepherdstown

name: Lancaster, PA
info: Mom and I rented some bikes to take a cruise in summer 2017 while I was working as an RA at a summer camp

name: Wisconsin
info: Zack and I did a century ride in summer 2020 from Iron Mountain, MI. We crossed into Wisconsin for ~30 miles of the ride

name: Pleasant Prairie, WI
info:
Raced at Pleasant Prairie Junior Elite Cup in 2015 - my first draft legal triathlon! 
                                Unfortunately got DQ'd for being too slow at this one - but learned a lot for next year

name: Mackinac Island
info: Only US Highway without cars. Summer 2020

name: Fat tire bike
info: Fat tire bike! Winter 2021 with Christoph

name: Detroit
info:
Decided to bike from Ann Arbor to Detroit and back again. Was this a good idea?
                                Maybe. Probably. I got to see a lot. Summer 2020

name: South Haven, MI
info: Halfway point between Evanston and Ann Arbor for COVID quarantine rides with Zack in spring/summer 2020

name: Tuscaloosa, AL
info: Raced at Collegiate Triathlon Nationals, spring 2018

name: Mt. Mitchell
info: Climbed Mt. Mitchell with the Yale Cycling Team in March 2020

name: Outer Banks
info: Outer Banks riding with Christoph in March 2021

name: C&O Canal
info: Rode from Washington area to Cumberland, MD along the C&O Canal with Christoph in spring 2021. 2.5 days and camped along the way

name: Lake Placid
info: My first (and so far only, but hopefully won't stay this way) half ironman in Lake Placid in fall 2018. With some friends from the Yale Triathlon team

name: Delaware
info: Rode across Delaware with Christoph in spring 2021

name: New York City
info:
Lea and rode from New Haven to NYC in fall 2019. Didn't quite make it into Manhattan, but
                                did make it to a subway station in the Bronx

name: Buzzards Bay
info: Buzzards Bay triathlon with the Yale Triathlon team in fall 2017

name: Virginia
info: Trip with the Yale Cycling Team in spring 2017. The longest rides I had done at the time! Blue Ridge Parkway in Shenandoah and some farmland rolling hills

name: Ohio
info: Raced a triathlon along the shore of lake Erie in summer 2017. Mom joined in on this one, too

name: Manistique, MI
info: Bike trip with Zack in summer 2020

name: Northwestern CT
info: Beautiful ride with Christoph starting in Kent with stops at Arethusa farm, Thorncrest Chocolates, and a waterfall

name: Philadelphia
info: My first race with the Yale Cycling Team in spring 2017

name: Kentucky
info: Drove down to Kentucky to see the solar eclipse in summer 2017. Picture of "dusk" at 2pm

name: Ithaca
info: Beautiful! Fall 2020

name: Appalachian Trail
info: Hiked the Maryland section with Christoph in fall 2020

name: Tahquamenon Falls
info: So cold that the waterfall was partially frozen. I didn't even know that waterfalls could freeze. Wow. Winter 2021

name: Pictured Rocks
info: Pictured Rocks hike with Zack in summer 2020

name: Estes Park, CO
info: Absolutely fell in love with Colorado during the trip w/ family in June 2021. Went outdoor rock climbing and rode around on a rented bike. Hopefully I can return someday soon.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
info: Colorado is so beautiful. Hike with family, June 2021

name: Glenwood Springs, CO
info: White water rafting with family in June 2021!

name: California Hills
info: Moutain bike ride! Lea's mom was kind enough to take me out on her local trail on my one afternoon visiting Los Gatos in July 2021.

name: Nevada
info: Crossed the Nevada border after a beautiful ride up Ebbett's and Pacific Grade Passes in the Sierra Nevadas. With Lea on the 4th of July 2021.

name: Zion
info: Hiking in Zion National Park with Christoph in October 2021. Hiked Angels Landing and the Narrows.

name: Entering Colorado
info: Entering Colorado during Utah bike tour with Christoph in October 2021

name: Utah
info: Bike touring Utah with Christoph in October 2021 - incredible! A new landscape around every corner

name: Vermont
info: Winter getaway weekend (February 2022) with Christoph in Wilmington, VT - beautiful hike and learned to downhill ski!
